name: Ricetta: torretta di frittelle ai funghi bianchi
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Fungo
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Formaggio
value.desc: A base di latte fermentato. Ad alto contenuto energetico e usato in una vasta gamma di piatti.

value.name: Panna
value.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

value.name: Torretta di frittelle ai funghi bianchi
value.desc: A crunchy appetizer that's baked with mushrooms and cheese on top of bread slices. A single whiff of its amazing smell is enough to fill one with anticipation. Give it a bite, and you'll experience a pleasant burst of sweetness.

value.text: In-game Mail Reward sent on August 29, 2022
